mapper.select: SELECT id,pid,code,name,address,remark,`code` AS description FROM sys_org WHERE rid=#{topOrgId} AND deleted=0 ORDER BY id
SELECT id,pid,name,id AS `value` FROM sys_org WHERE deleted=0 ORDER BY id

SELECT a.id,queryOrgParentsName(a.id) AS `name`,a.address FROM sys_org a RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT x.org_id FROM sys_user_org x JOIN sys_user y ON x.user_id=y.id AND y.`status`=0 JOIN sys_user_role z ON z.user_id= y.id AND z.role_id=2 ) b ON a.id=b.org_id WHERE a.`deleted`=0 ORDER BY id ASC

SELECT DISTINCT `a`.`id` AS `id`, `a`.`username` AS `username`, `a`.`real_name` AS `real_name`, `a`.`nick_name` AS `nick_name`, `a`.`avatar` AS `avatar`, `a`.`sex` AS `sex`, `a`.`phone` AS `phone`, `a`.`email` AS `email` FROM `sys_user` a RIGHT JOIN sys_user_org b ON a.id=b.user_id RIGHT JOIN sys_user_role c ON a.id=c.user_id WHERE c.role_id=#{roleId} AND b.org_id=#{orgId} AND a.deleted=0

SELECT petition_event_info.event_num as event_num, petition_event_info.name as name, petitioner_info.name as petitioner_name, dict_petition_event_place.name as event_place_name, petition_event_info.event_content as event_content from sys_org, petition_event_info, petitioner_info, dict_petition_event_place where sys_org.id=#{orgId} and sys_org.id=petition_event_info.reception_org_id and petition_event_info.status=1 and petition_event_info.deleted =0 and petition_event_info.idcard=petitioner_info.idcard and dict_petition_event_place.id=petition_event_info.event_place_id and duty_unit_id=#{unitId}

SELECT petition_event_info.event_num as event_num, petition_event_info.name as name, petitioner_info.name as petitioner_name, dict_petition_event_place.name as event_place_name, petition_event_info.event_content as event_content from sys_org, petition_event_info, petitioner_info, dict_petition_event_place where sys_org.id=#{orgId} and sys_org.id=petition_event_info.reception_org_id and petition_event_info.status=1 and petition_event_info.deleted =0 and petition_event_info.idcard=petitioner_info.idcard and dict_petition_event_place.id=petition_event_info.event_place_id and petition_event_info.duty_unit_id=#{unitId} and petition_event_info.create_time>= #{beginDate} and #{endDate}>=petition_event_info.create_time
